About Me

Goal-oriented, Self-motivated and Endless learner

Jiwon Han or Tina

There has been many transitions in my life so far and it's still ongoing! I lived in Korea and came to Seattle in 2016. I majored in Communication in college and have read many people thoughts. I was an Administrative assistant and supported my manager and teams so that they focus on business more efficiently. I am currently embarking on software engineering career. I always try my best to experience and learn new things every moment and every place I am in.
